default.title: Lose Battles
default.text: It's just one failed attempt. Take everyone back. I'll repair all the damaged parts.

default.title: Obtain the Sinner
default.text: A discrepancy in the mechanical operation... Did you cause it... What changes will you bring to the future?

default.title: Raise to Phase 1
default.text: Debugging completed... I can go even further now...

default.title: Raise to Phase 3
default.text: The end of change... is eternity...

default.title: Level Start
default.text: This is a necessary process...

default.title: Win Battles
default.text: I create the machines to assist you. Go, I'll always be here.

default.title: Ultimate Skill
default.text: It ends here!

default.title: Die in Battles
default.text: Everything will eventually come to a standstill at somepoint...

default.title: Greeting
default.text: You seem a bit different... Discrepancies arise over time. How long has it been... since we last met?

default.title: Conversation 1
default.text: Behavior... must be guided by rules... A broken machine... will only lead one into eternal deviation... I'll fix it for you...

default.title: Conversation 2
default.text: Don't change... Don't deny it... Stay accurate... Stay... stable... I won't break... My existence will reach the final border...

default.title: Conversation 3
default.text: From springs and cogs... to bearings and internal combustion engines... to circuits and semiconductors... Humans today, technology a century later from my time... What will it look like...

default.title: Special Conversation 1
default.text: In DisSea, all laws are distorted... Time, space, and even memory... are no longer trustworthy... Perhaps what I'm obsessed with is something that can be relied upon in this torrent.

default.title: Special Conversation 3
default.text: So this is what the world outside DisSea looks like now... I thought... the scenery there, the never-ending disaster, and my watchtower... would never change... until eternity...

default.title: Compliance
default.text: I didn't understand the meaning of our encounter before... But now, I do... It's like eternal gears being worn down, errant currents returning to their source... Your arrival signaled... the everlasting first second has passed.

default.title: Special Conversation 2
default.text: Time won't twist a person's mind... Despair will... Remember your purpose. Remember the earliest promise. This way... even if you're caught up by despair... it can't devour you...

default.title: Idle
default.text: Time's passing... at the normal rate... I'm not used to it yet...

default.title: Annoyed
default.text: Why repeat such movements? Your limbs are probably malfunctioning... Let me inspect and repair them for you now...

default.title: Special Attention
default.text: When my companions feel lost, they often come to me... I guess people are always seeking unchanging things as anchors in turmoil... Are you the same? Are you... feeling uneasy?

default.title: Dispatch
default.text: This is my direction...

default.title: Dispatch Completion
default.text: No deviation in the return path... I'm home.

default.title: Level Up
default.text: It's more stable now...

default.title: Deploy
default.text: Leave... Don't come any closer.

default.title: Pat Head
default.text: There's no switch here. You can't turn me off...
